MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the SY16 postcode area of Newtown, affecting properties in Garth Owen and surrounding streets. This is causing flickering power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at 4:43PM. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:45PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 4:55PM on Sunday 7th March 2021
